title: Ticket #3163: fetchwork: Consider sub-slot/dynamic slot/partitionable slot informati
description:
Need to think about fetchwork's interaction with partionable slots. In particular:

  • HOOK_FETCH_WORK is told the slot. It seems like a good thing to use to generate unique-to-the-machine identifiers, but it's useless with partitionable slots since everyone will be told "1". May be okay, just worth calling out.

  • Is HOOK_REPLY_FETCH told the sub-slot information? Even if it is, is it too late to be useful, because the startd will not wait for it to return.

  • HOOK_PREPARE_JOB would be a good place to handle this, but it's not given the slot classad at all.
